meanings.definition: Designed with excessive or unnecessary features.
meanings.sent1: The overdesigned cake had so many decorations that it looked messy.
meanings.sent2: The overdesigned website was difficult to navigate due to all the unnecessary buttons.
meanings.sent3: The overdesigned outfit made her look like a walking Christmas tree.
meanings.sent4: The overdesigned car resembled a futuristic spaceship rather than a practical vehicle.
meanings.sent5: The overdesigned building stood out in the neighborhood with its excessive use of colors and shapes.

meanings.definition: To design with too many elements or details.
meanings.sent1: She overdesigned the poster by adding too many graphics and text.
meanings.sent2: The architect tends to overdesign his buildings, making them overly complex.
meanings.sent3: He overdesigned the party invitation, making it more like a work of art than a simple invite.
meanings.sent4: The chef warned not to overdesign the dish with too many ingredients that might clash.
meanings.sent5: The artist decided to overdesign the mural, covering every inch of the wall with intricate patterns.
